scripts.build: npm run scss && npm run build-sw-precache && npm run concat-sw-offline-ga && npm run copy-sw-offline-google-analytycs
scripts.copy-sw-offline-google-analytycs: rm -f dist/js/sw-offline-google-analytics.js && cp -a node_modules/sw-offline-google-analytics/build/importScripts/sw-offline-google-analytics.prod.*js dist/js/ && rename dist/js/sw-offline-google-analytics.prod.*js dist/js/sw-offline-google-analytics.js
